comments: Cunningham (DET) briefly places a hand on Rozier's (CHA) body and immediately removes it without affecting his jump shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Rozier (CHA) and marginal contact occurs as Rozier moves around the screen.
Washington (CHA) makes contact to Stewart's (DET) wrist that affects his shot attempt.
Martin (CHA) and Hayes (DET) make incidental contact with each other during the loose ball.
Washington (CHA) jumps vertically and maintains a legal vertical position contesting the play at the basket by Bey (DET).
Washington (CHA) and Bey (DET) make incidental contact with each other during the loose ball.  Both players have their hands on the ball and a held ball is whistled.
Washington (CHA) is in a legal guarding position defending Cunningham's (DET) drive to the basket and he cleanly steals the ball away from him.
Ball (CHA) gathers the ball and takes three steps.
Rozier (CHA) makes marginal contact with Bey (DET) that does not affect his putback shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) delivers contact to Hayes' (DET) side as he attempts to firm up in a screening position in his path.
Grant (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Martin (CHA) and does not deliver contact.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) sets the screen on Grant (DET) and the two players briefly engage and disengage during the defensive switch.
Bey (DET) and Washington (CHA) engage during the rebound and the contact is marginal.  Washington trips over Stewart's (DET) leg and it causes him to fall to the floor.
Bey (DET) reaches in and initiates contact to Bridges (CHA) that affects his SQBR.
Ball (CHA) reaches in and makes clean contact with the ball and any ensuing contact with Cunningham (DET) is marginal.
Bridges (CHA) places his off-arm against Grant (DET) and does not extend it into him when he releases from the contact.  Grant's momentum is already carrying him in the same direction.
Stewart (DET) makes marginal body contact with Bridges (CHA) that does not affect his shot attempt.
Cunningham (DET) makes contact to Washington's (CHA) arm that affects his putback shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) cleanly deflects the throw-in away from Hayes (DET) and any contact is incidental.
Hayes (DET) legally contests Ball's (CHA) jump shot attempt.  Any marginal contact is created by Ball extending his leg.

Replay review of the foul called on Grant (DET) pursuant to a coach?s challenge was deemed unsuccessful.  Grant is moving laterally and not in a legal guarding position at the time of the contact with Bridges (CHA).
Grant (DET) hops consecutively on the same foot upon gathering the ball.
Stewart (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Washington (CHA) and does not deliver contact.
Rozier (CHA) steals and possesses the ball before the expiration of the shot clock.
Stewart (DET) makes incidental contact with Washington's (CHA) hand on the ball during the shot attempt.  The contact to the body is marginal.
Washington (CHA) and Stewart (DET) make incidental contact with each other as they both get their hands on the ball.  A held ball is then whistled.
Martin (CHA) reaches in and initiates contact with Cunningham (DET) that affects his SQBR.
Washington (CHA) legally contests Olynyk's (DET) jump shot attempt.
